text.text: Many are selected, Few are chosen

The original incarnation of Coniagas was in the Town of Cobalt in the mining boom at the turn of the century. The name spelled out the key products: Cobalt, Nickel, Silver, and Arsenic. A handful of prospects in the back country grew into a vertically integrated producer of specialized metal products shipped around the globe. Once again demand for critical metals has gripped the world and the name Coniagas marks a return to form.

The resurrected team of Coniagas are regional veterans who understand both the local geology and the imperative of the energy transition. The company combines world class battery metal deposits and a capable metallurgical process with the expertise required to reach production.
